Key Match Events: Caden Dana became the youngest pitcher in Angels history to win his major league debut
Taylor Ward homered in the first inning for the Mariners
Jarred Raley homered in the second inning for the Mariners
Juan Rojas hit a sacrifice fly in the third inning, scoring Rojas
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the third game in the regular season series between the Mariners and Angels
The game was played at Angel Stadium in Anaheim, California
The game lasted 2 hours and 36 minutes
Others: Bryce Miller started for the Mariners, with a record of 12-8 and an ERA of 2.94
Caden Dana started for the Angels, with a record of 1-2 and an ERA of 9.58
The final score was 3-2 in favor of the Angels
